column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Azula says : " We have been presented with an extraordinary opportunity , girls . "
#Text=Ty Lee says : " Mai finally gets to wear make - up that 's not totally depressing ? "
#Text=Mai says : " Ha , ha . "
#Text=Azula says : " I 'm talking about conquering the whole Earth Kingdom .
#Text=I really admire that about you .
#Text=" Azula says : " From the inside , we 're in perfect position to organize a coup and overthrow the Earth King .
#Text=The key is the Dai Li .
#Text=Whoever controls the Dai Li controls Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Pathik says : " In order to master the Avatar State , you must open all the chakras .
#Text=Aang , tell me everything you know about chakras .
#Text=" Aang says : " What are chakras ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " Oh , I see .
#Text=I guess we 'll start with the basics .
#Text=The water flows through this creek , much like the energy flows through your body .
#Text=As you see , there are several pools where the water swirls around before flowing on .
#Text=These pools are like our chakras .
#Text=" Aang says : " So chakras are pools of spiraling energy in our bodies ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " Exactly .
#Text=If nothing else were around , this creek would flow pure and clear .
#Text=However , life is messy , and things tend to fall in the creek .
#Text=And then what happens ?
#Text=" Aang says : " The creek ca n't flow ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " Yes .
#Text=But , if we open the ponds between the pools ... " Aang says : " The energy flows !
#Text=" Pathik says : " There are seven chakras that go up the body .
#Text=Each pool of energy has a purpose , and can be blocked by a specific kind of emotional muck .
#Text=Be warned , opening the chakras is an intense experience , and once you begin the process , you can not stop until all seven are open .
#Text=Are you ready ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll do whatever it takes .
#Text=" Pathik says : " First we will open the Earth Chakra , located at the base of the spine .
#Text=It deals with survival , and is blocked by fear .
#Text=What are you most afraid of ?
#Text=Let your fears become clear to you .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Aang , your vision is not real .
#Text=You are concerned for your survival , but you must surrender those fears .
#Text=Let your fears flow down the creek .
#Text=You have opened your Earth Chakra !
#Text=" Pathik says : " Next is the ... " Aang says : " Water Chakra ?
#Text=" Pathik says : " Brilliant !
#Text=Maybe one day you will be a guru too !
#Text=This chakra deals with pleasure and is blocked by guilt .
#Text=Now , look at all the guilt with burdens you so .
#Text=What do you blame yourself for ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I ran away .
#Text=I hurt all of those people .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Accept the reality that these things happened , but do not let them cloud and poison your energy .
#Text=If you are to be a positive influence on the world , you need to forgive yourself .
#Text="
